QUESR_TEMP_ANSWERS.name: QUESR_TEMP_ANSWERS
QUESR_TEMP_ANSWERS.description: The QUESR_TEMP_ANSWERS table stores information about patient questionnaire answers which have not been submitted. The records included in this table are partial submissions which may be modified by the patient before being moved to the permanent storage location.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: QUESR_TMP_ANSWER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the answer set for this row.

columns.name: QUESR_TMP_MYPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient account for this row.

columns.name: QUESR_TMP_ROOT_ID
columns.description: Stores the root questionnaire (LQF) record ID for each questionnaire that has not yet been submitted.

columns.name: QUESR_TMP_ROOT_ID_FORM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the form associated with the questionnaire.

columns.name: CTX_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: If the TEMP_QUESR_SRC_WRKFLW_C is a value of 1, this stores the contact serial number of the patient contact that serves as the appointment context for this temporary questionnaire answer.

QUESR_TEMP_ANSWERS.QUESR_TMP_ROOT_ID_FORM_NAME: UPH ACCIDENT RELATED/DATE OF ONSET QUESTIONNAIRE
